entry.title: Hive回填表
entry.summary:
<style type="text/css">/*!
*
* IPython notebook
*
*/
/* CSS font colors for translated ANSI colors. */
.ansibold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
/* use dark versions for foreground, to improve visibility */
.ansiblack {
  color: black;
}
.ansired {
  color: darkred;
}
.ansigreen {
  color: darkgreen;
}
.ansiyellow {
  color: #c4a000;
}
.ansiblue {
  color: darkblue;
}
.ansipurple {
  color: darkviolet;
}
.ansicyan {
  color: steelblue;
}
.ansigray {
  color: gray;
}
/* and light for background, for the same reason */
.ansibgblack {
  background-color: black;
}
.ansibgred {
  background-color: red;
}
.ansibggreen {
  background-color: green;
}
.ansibgyellow {
  background-color: yellow;
}
.ansibgblue {
  background-color: blue;
}
.ansibgpurple {
  background-color: magenta;
}
.ansibgcyan {
  background-color: cyan;
}
.ansibggray {
  background-color: gray;
}
div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: transparent;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5px;
  /* This acts as a spacer between cells, that is outside the border */
  margin: 0px;
  outline: none;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent -40px, transparent 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 100%);
}
div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-color: #90CAF9;
  border-left-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  border-right-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-right-width: 1px;
  background: #E3F2FD;
}
@media print {
  div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #ababab;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-width: 0;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 7px, #E3F2FD 7px, #E3F2FD 100%);
}
.edit_mode div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #66BB6A;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #66BB6A -40px, #66BB6A 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  .edit_mode div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */
  min-width: 14ex;
  /* This padding is tuned to match the padding on the CodeMirror editor. */
  padding: 0.4em;
  margin: 0px;
  font-family: monospace;
  text-align: right;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Don't highlight prompt number selection */
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  /* Use default cursor */
  cursor: default;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  .prompt {
    text-align: left;
  }
}
div.inner_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
}
@-moz-document url-prefix() {
  div.inner_cell {
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_area {
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  border-radius: 2px;
  background: #f7f7f7;
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* This is needed so that empty prompt areas can collapse to zero height when there
   is no content in the output_subarea and the prompt. The main purpose of this is
   to make sure that empty JavaScript output_subareas have no height. */
div.prompt:empty {
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
div.unrecognized_cell {
  padding: 5px 5px 5px 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell {
  border-radius: 2px;
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  background: #eaeaea;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.unrecognized_cell > div.prompt {
    display: none;
  }
}
div.code_cell {
  /* avoid page breaking on code cells when printing */
}
@media print {
  div.code_cell {
    page-break-inside: avoid;
  }
}
/* any special styling for code cells that are currently running goes here */
div.input {
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.input {
    /* Old browsers */
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    display: -moz-box;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-align: stretch;
    display: box;
    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_prompt {
  color: #303F9F;
  border-top: 1px solid transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight {
  margin: 0.4em;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight > pre {
  margin: 0px;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;
 * }
 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;
  /* Changed from white to allow our bg to show through */
}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */
  /* we have set a different line-height and want this to scale with that. */
  padding: 0.4em;
}
.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  padding: 0 8px 0 4px;
}
.CodeMirror-gutters {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
  border-top-left-radius: 2px;
}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. We need the 0 value because of how we size */
  /* .CodeMirror-lines */
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/*

Original style from softwaremaniacs.org (c) Ivan Sagalaev <Maniac@SoftwareManiacs.Org>
Adapted from GitHub theme

*/
.highlight-base {
  color: #000;
}
.highlight-variable {
  color: #000;
}
.highlight-variable-2 {
  color: #1a1a1a;
}
.highlight-variable-3 {
  color: #333333;
}
.highlight-string {
  color: #BA2121;
}
.highlight-comment {
  color: #408080;
  font-style: italic;
}
.highlight-number {
  color: #080;
}
.highlight-atom {
  color: #88F;
}
.highlight-keyword {
  color: #008000;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.highlight-builtin {
  color: #008000;
}
.highlight-error {
  color: #f00;
}
.highlight-operator {
  color: #AA22FF;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.highlight-meta {
  color: #AA22FF;
}
/* previously not defined, copying from default codemirror */
.highlight-def {
  color: #00f;
}
.highlight-string-2 {
  color: #f50;
}
.highlight-qualifier {
  color: #555;
}
.highlight-bracket {
  color: #997;
}
.highlight-tag {
  color: #170;
}
.highlight-attribute {
  color: #00c;
}
.highlight-header {
  color: blue;
}
.highlight-quote {
  color: #090;
}
.highlight-link {
  color: #00c;
}
/* apply the same style to codemirror */
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-keyword {
  color: #008000;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-atom {
  color: #88F;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-number {
  color: #080;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-def {
  color: #00f;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-variable {
  color: #000;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-operator {
  color: #AA22FF;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-variable-2 {
  color: #1a1a1a;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-variable-3 {
  color: #333333;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-comment {
  color: #408080;
  font-style: italic;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-string {
  color: #BA2121;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-string-2 {
  color: #f50;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-meta {
  color: #AA22FF;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-qualifier {
  color: #555;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-builtin {
  color: #008000;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-bracket {
  color: #997;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-tag {
  color: #170;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-attribute {
  color: #00c;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-header {
  color: blue;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-quote {
  color: #090;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-link {
  color: #00c;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-error {
  color: #f00;
}
.cm-s-ipython span.cm-tab {
  background: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAADAAAAAMCAYAAAAkuj5RAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAGFJREFUSMft1LsRQFAQheHPowAKoACx3IgEKtaEHujDjORSgWTH/ZOdnZOcM/sgk/kFFWY0qV8foQwS4MKBCS3qR6ixBJvElOobYAtivseIE120FaowJPN75GMu8j/LfMwNjh4HUpwg4LUAAAAASUVORK5CYII=);
  background-position: right;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay {
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0px 0.4em;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {
  /* use inner shadow to get border that is computed the same on WebKit/FF */
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  background: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.5);
}
div.output_prompt {
  color: #D84315;
}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */
div.output_area {
  padding: 0px;
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.output_area .MathJax_Display {
  text-align: left !important;
}
div.output_area 
div.output_area 
div.output_area img,
div.output_area svg {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
div.output_area img.unconfined,
div.output_area svg.unconfined {
  max-width: none;
}
/* This is needed to protect the pre formating from global settings such
   as that of bootstrap */
.output {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.output_area {
    /* Old browsers */
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    display: -moz-box;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-align: stretch;
    display: box;
    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {
  padding: 0;
}
.js-error {
  color: darkred;
}
/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  padding-top: 5px;
}
pre.raw_input_prompt {
  /* nothing needed here. */
}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {
  box-shadow: none;
}
p.p-space {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
div.output_unrecognized {
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
}
div.output_unrecognized a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.output_unrecognized a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.rendered_html {
  color: #000;
  /* any extras will just be numbers: */
}



.rendered_html :link {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.rendered_html :visited {
  text-decoration: underline;
}






.rendered_html h1:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.538em;
}
.rendered_html h2:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.636em;
}
.rendered_html h3:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.777em;
}
.rendered_html h4:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h5:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h6:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}








.rendered_html * + ul {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html * + ol {
  margin-top: 1em;
}


.rendered_html pre,



.rendered_html tr,
.rendered_html th,

.rendered_html td,


.rendered_html * + table {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + p {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + img {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html img,

.rendered_html img.unconfined,

div.text_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.text_cell > div.prompt {
    display: none;
  }
}
div.text_cell_render {
  /*font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Arial, Helvetica, Geneva, sans-serif;*/
  outline: none;
  resize: none;
  width: inherit;
  border-style: none;
  padding: 0.5em 0.5em 0.5em 0.4em;
  color: #000;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
}
a.anchor-link:link {
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 0px 20px;
  visibility: hidden;
}
h1:hover .anchor-link,
h2:hover .anchor-link,
h3:hover .anchor-link,
h4:hover .anchor-link,
h5:hover .anchor-link,
h6:hover .anchor-link {
  visibility: visible;
}
.text_cell.rendered .input_area {
  display: none;
}
.text_cell.rendered 
.text_cell.unrendered .text_cell_render {
  display: none;
}
.cm-header-1,
.cm-header-2,
.cm-header-3,
.cm-header-4,
.cm-header-5,
.cm-header-6 {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
.cm-header-1 {
  font-size: 185.7%;
}
.cm-header-2 {
  font-size: 157.1%;
}
.cm-header-3 {
  font-size: 128.6%;
}
.cm-header-4 {
  font-size: 110%;
}
.cm-header-5 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}
.cm-header-6 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}
</style>
<style type="text/css">.highlight .hll { background-color: #ffffcc }
.highlight  { background: #f8f8f8; }
.highlight .c { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment */
.highlight .err { border: 1px solid #FF0000 } /* Error */
.highlight .k { color: #008000; font-weight: bold } /* Keyword */
.highlight .o { color: #666666 } /* Operator */
.highlight .ch { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Hashbang */
.highlight .cm { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Multiline */
.highlight .cp { color: #BC7A00 } /* Comment.Preproc */
.highlight .cpf { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.PreprocFile */
.highlight .c1 { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Single */
.highlight .cs { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Special */
.highlight .gd { color: #A00000 } /* Generic.Deleted */
.highlight .ge { font-style: italic } /* Generic.Emph */
.highlight .gr { color: #FF0000 } /* Generic.Error */
.highlight .gh { color: #000080; font-weight: bold } /* Generic.Heading */
.highlight .gi { color: #00A000 } /* Generic.Inserted */

<style type="text/css">
/* Temporary definitions which will become obsolete with Notebook release 5.0 */
.ansi-black-fg { color: #3E424D; }
.ansi-black-bg { background-color: #3E424D; }
.ansi-black-intense-fg { color: #282C36; }
.ansi-black-intense-bg { background-color: #282C36; }

.ansi-red-bg { background-color: #E75C58; }
.ansi-red-intense-fg { color: #B22B31; }
.ansi-red-intense-bg { background-color: #B22B31; }
.ansi-green-fg { color: #00A250; }
.ansi-green-bg { background-color: #00A250; }
.ansi-green-intense-fg { color: #007427; }
.ansi-green-intense-bg { background-color: #007427; }
.ansi-yellow-fg { color: #DDB62B; }
.ansi-yellow-bg { background-color: #DDB62B; }
.ansi-yellow-intense-fg { color: #B27D12; }
.ansi-yellow-intense-bg { background-color: #B27D12; }

.ansi-blue-bg { background-color: #208FFB; }
.ansi-blue-intense-fg { color: #0065CA; }
.ansi-blue-intense-bg { background-color: #0065CA; }
.ansi-magenta-fg { color: #D160C4; }
.ansi-magenta-bg { background-color: #D160C4; }
.ansi-magenta-intense-fg { color: #A03196; }
.ansi-magenta-intense-bg { background-color: #A03196; }

.ansi-cyan-bg { background-color: #60C6C8; }
.ansi-cyan-intense-fg { color: #258F8F; }
.ansi-cyan-intense-bg { background-color: #258F8F; }
.ansi-white-fg { color: #C5C1B4; }
.ansi-white-bg { background-color: #C5C1B4; }
.ansi-white-intense-fg { color: #A1A6B2; }
.ansi-white-intense-bg { background-color: #A1A6B2; }

.ansi-bold { font-weight: bold; }
</style>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="s2">"today is Tuesday"</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[1]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'today is Tuesday'</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>前两天写了一个HiveSQL，目的是对表进行回填。逻辑这样的，很简单：</p>
<ul>
<li><p>有张表叫<strong>UU</strong>,要与<strong>tb_Xdr_ifc_s1mme</strong>表中的三个字段<strong>(MMEUES1APID、MMEGROUPID、MMECODE)</strong>一致，表示是一次通话；</p>
</li>
<li><p>在这个基础上回填字段<strong>PROCEDUREENDTIME</strong>。</p>
</li>
<li><p>回填<strong>PROCEDUREENDTIME</strong>只要一次就ok，取第一次出现的值。</p>
</li>
<li><p>每10分钟回填一次。</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>ok，逻辑还算简单，只是表的数据量比较大，UU表有60G的数据需要回填，所以用Hive也是需要2个小时来处理。</p>
<hr>
</hr></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<pre><code>SELECT
    *            //这里应该是每个字段的内容，考虑到保密性质，所以用“*”代替。
FROM
    TB_XDR_IFC_UU UU
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        B.IMSI,
        B.IMEI,
        B.MSISDN,
        A .MMEUES1APID,
        A .MMEGROUPID,
        A .MMECODE,
        A .PROCEDUREENDTIME
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                MMEUES1APID,
                MMEGROUPID,
                MMECODE,
                MIN (PROCEDUREENDTIME) PROCEDUREENDTIME
            FROM
                tb_Xdr_ifc_s1mme
            GROUP BY
                MMEUES1APID,
                MMEGROUPID,
                MMECODE
        ) A
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT
            IMSI,
            IMEI,
            MSISDN,
            MMEUES1APID,
            MMEGROUPID,
            MMECODE,
            PROCEDUREENDTIME
        FROM
            tb_Xdr_ifc_s1mme
    ) B ON A .PROCEDUREENDTIME = B.PROCEDUREENDTIME
    AND A .MMEUES1APID = B.MMEUES1APID
    AND A .MMEGROUPID = B.MMEGROUPID
    AND A .MMECODE = B.MMECODE
) S1 ON UU.MMEUES1APID = S1.MMEUES1APID
AND UU.MMEGROUPID = S1.MMEGROUPID
AND UU.MMECODE = S1.MMECODE
WHERE
    UU.PROCEDUREENDTIME - S1.PROCEDUREENDTIME <= 600000</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">if (!document.getElementById('mathjaxscript_pelican_#%@#$@#')) {

        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +

        "        processEscapes: true," +
        "        preview: 'TeX'," +

        "    'HTML-CSS': { " +
        "        styles: { '.MathJax_Display, .MathJax .mo, .MathJax .mi, .MathJax .mn': {color: 'black ! important'} }" +
        "    } " +
        "}); ";
    (document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(mathjaxscript);
}

/* CSS font colors for translated ANSI colors. */

div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: transparent;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5px;
  /* This acts as a spacer between cells, that is outside the border */
  margin: 0px;
  outline: none;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent -40px, transparent 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 100%);
}
div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-color: #90CAF9;
  border-left-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  border-right-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-right-width: 1px;
  background: #E3F2FD;
}
@media print {
  div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #ababab;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-width: 0;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 7px, #E3F2FD 7px, #E3F2FD 100%);
}
.edit_mode div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #66BB6A;
  border-left-width: 0px;

  background: linear-gradient(to right, #66BB6A -40px, #66BB6A 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  .edit_mode div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */
  min-width: 14ex;
  /* This padding is tuned to match the padding on the CodeMirror editor. */
  padding: 0.4em;
  margin: 0px;
  font-family: monospace;
  text-align: right;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Don't highlight prompt number selection */
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  /* Use default cursor */
  cursor: default;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  .prompt {
    text-align: left;
  }
}
div.inner_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
}
@-moz-document url-prefix() {
  div.inner_cell {
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_area {
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  border-radius: 2px;
  background: #f7f7f7;
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* This is needed so that empty prompt areas can collapse to zero height when there
   is no content in the output_subarea and the prompt. The main purpose of this is
   to make sure that empty JavaScript output_subareas have no height. */
div.prompt:empty {
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
div.unrecognized_cell {
  padding: 5px 5px 5px 0px;

}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell {
  border-radius: 2px;

}

}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a:hover {

}

}
div.code_cell {

}

}
/* any special styling for code cells that are currently running goes here */
div.input {

/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_prompt {

/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;

 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;

}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;

}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */

  padding: 0.4em;

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay {
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0px 0.4em;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {
  /* use inner shadow to get border that is computed the same on WebKit/FF */
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  background: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.5);
}
div.output_prompt {
  color: #D84315;
}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */
div.output_area {
  padding: 0px;
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */

  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}

}

div.output_area

}

}
/* This is needed to protect the pre formating from global settings such

.output {

  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;

div.output_area pre {

/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after

/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different

/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="什么是TensorFlow">什么是TensorFlow<a class="anchor-link" href="#什么是TensorFlow">¶</a></h3><p>上篇文章中我介绍了如何安装TensorFlow，之所以要分开写这两篇文章，是为了以后如果换机器的话能够快速的在我的笔记中找到安装方法。哈哈，那么这篇文章我就详细介绍一下什么是TensorFlow，以及来通过一个小例子说明它的神奇之处。</p>
<p>它是一个可以用数据流图在学习模型的机器学习库，主要的目的是用来解决自然语言处理(NLP)以及图像识别任务。用户可以自己用TensorFlow为深度学习创建一个神经网络结构，并且TensorFlow还允许用户与统计机器学习算法一起使用。但是目前它的使用条件比较苛刻，必须是在它允许的依赖环境中开发程序。此外，Tensorflow是第二代机器学习系统，它已经建立完善并且取代了它的前身DistBelief.</p>
<h3 id="什么是数据流图(data-flow-graph)">什么是数据流图(data flow graph)<a class="anchor-link" href="#什么是数据流图(data-flow-graph)">¶</a></h3><p>在TensorFlow中所有的计算都可以用有向图来表示，它们的computor都是各个节点，通过节点的边缘指向另一个节点。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">IPython.display</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">Image</span>
<span class="n">Image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">filename</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'icons/TensorFlow-graph1.jpg'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">width</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">400</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">height</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">600</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>顺便在这提一嘴，TensorFlow有它自己的可视化模块，叫做TensorBoard，它可以用来创建模型，以便用户来跟踪数据流。</p>
<h3 id="什么是tensors?">什么是tensors?<a class="anchor-link" href="#什么是tensors?">¶</a></h3><p>数据在TensorFlow中被表示为tensors,简单来理解，它就是个三维的矩阵(当然这么说从数学角度上并不严格)。在下面的图中，你可以看到，程序运行是可以对tensor来回捯饬，相比矩阵而言，它更具有灵活性。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">filename</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'icons/Tensor1.jpg'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="它牛逼在什么地方？">它牛逼在什么地方？<a class="anchor-link" href="#它牛逼在什么地方？">¶</a></h3><ol>
<li><p>表示起来更加灵活。用户可以通过它来创建各种各样的数据流图，把你的算法用数据流图来展现出来。</p>
</li>
<li><p>TensorFlow支持在CPU上运行和GPU(前提是已经安装了<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUDA">CUDA</a>)上运行,并且它支持并行、异步运算。当然，你可以使TensorFlow运行在任何硬件上，服务器上也中，个人笔记本也中，常言道，你高兴就好。</p>
</li>
<li><p>你可以用TensorFlow做研究或者生产，再或者，结合一下，你可以用TensorFlow将你做研究用的模型移植到你的产品上，当然在移植之后要注意代码的优化。</p>
</li>
<li><p>自动分化。TensorFlow还可以为你自动计算导数。如果你喜欢像随机梯度下降这种基于梯度的机器学习算法的话，那么TensorFlow将会给你带来惊喜。</p>
</li>
<li><p>Python接口。这个就不用解释了，爱Python的朋友都懂。当然其他接口也陆陆续续将要到来。</p>
</li>
</ol>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="教程指南">教程指南<a class="anchor-link" href="#教程指南">¶</a></h3><p><a href="http://tensorflow.org/tutorials/index.html">tutorial from official website</a></p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/aymericdamien/TensorFlow-Examples">these example on GitHub</a></p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow">simplified TensorFlow interface for scikit-learn</a></p>
<p><strong>注意:</strong>在使用TensorFlow的时候一定要安装numpy和matplotlib，如果你安装了CUDA的话，那么就可以依赖GPU计算。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="它和其他的机器学习库有什么不一样的地方，比如Theano">它和其他的机器学习库有什么不一样的地方，比如<a href="http://deeplearning.net/software/theano/">Theano</a><a class="anchor-link" href="#它和其他的机器学习库有什么不一样的地方，比如Theano">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li><p>最大的区别就是TensorFlow支出并行计算，而Theano不行</p>
</li>
<li><p>TensorFlow用起来更加灵活</p>
</li>
<li><p>TensorFlow的代码结构更加人性化、支持更加简单</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="一个简单的例子">一个简单的例子<a class="anchor-link" href="#一个简单的例子">¶</a></h3><p>下面这个例子是通过Tensorflow来让机器　学习一个一元线性方程。我会在代码中添加一些注释说明。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">tensorflow</span> <span class="kn">as</span> <span class="nn">tf</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="kn">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>

<span class="c1">#随机创造一些随机数</span>

<span class="c1">#在tensorflow中大部分数据是float32格式，所以在这里指定一下</span>
<span class="n">x_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rand</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">float32</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x_data</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">5</span>  <span class="c1">#创建一个一元二次方程</span>

<span class="c1">#创建tensorflow结构</span>
<span class="n">Weights</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Variable</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random_uniform</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">biases</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Variable</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]))</span>

<span class="c1">#定义将要预测的y</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Weights</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">x_data</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">biases</span>
<span class="c1">#定义误差</span>
<span class="n">loss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reduce_mean</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">square</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">y_data</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">optimizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">GradientDescentOptimizer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">#创建一个优化器，作用是为了每次迭代学习过程中减小误差，提升参数的准确度</span>
<span class="n">train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">optimizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">minimize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">loss</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#　初始化变量，让结构“活”起来:Returns an Op that initializes all variables.</span>
<span class="n">init</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">initialize_all_variables</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1">#创建会话</span>
<span class="c1"># A class for running TensorFlow operations.</span>
<span class="n">sess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Session</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="c1"># Runs the operations and evaluates the tensors in `fetches`.</span>
<span class="n">sess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">run</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">init</span><span class="p">)</span>  

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">step</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">sess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">run</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">step</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">step</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">sess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">run</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Weights</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">sess</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">run</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">biases</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>(0, array([ 8.46066284], dtype=float32), array([ 1.78436756], dtype=float32))
(10, array([ 5.10901833], dtype=float32), array([ 3.22589874], dtype=float32))
(20, array([ 3.54460478], dtype=float32), array([ 4.11859941], dtype=float32))
(30, array([ 2.76738191], dtype=float32), array([ 4.56210756], dtype=float32))
(40, array([ 2.38124657], dtype=float32), array([ 4.78244877], dtype=float32))
(50, array([ 2.18940878], dtype=float32), array([ 4.89191723], dtype=float32))
(60, array([ 2.09410071], dtype=float32), array([ 4.94630289], dtype=float32))
(70, array([ 2.04675078], dtype=float32), array([ 4.97332239], dtype=float32))
(80, array([ 2.0232265], dtype=float32), array([ 4.98674631], dtype=float32))
(90, array([ 2.01153922], dtype=float32), array([ 4.99341536], dtype=float32))
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>可以看到，每次训练的结果都会越来越接近我们在最初定义的方程。当然，由于我设置的步数还不够多，所以你可以看到参数还并没有到达最优化的效果。</p>
<p>好了，以上就是TensorFlow一个简单的应用，只能说，它真的是太强大了。在以后的文章中，我还会经常写一些有关TensorFlow的例子，感兴趣的朋友一起来学习吧。</p>
<h3 id="参考">参考<a class="anchor-link" href="#参考">¶</a></h3><p>[1] <a href="http://www.datasciencecentral.com/profiles/blogs/google-open-source-tensorflow">http://www.datasciencecentral.com/profiles/blogs/google-open-source-tensorflow</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

}

div.output_wrapper {

  position: relative;

/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;

.output {

}
div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;

  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {
  padding: 0;
}
.js-error {
  color: darkred;
}
/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  padding-top: 5px;
}
pre.raw_input_prompt {
  /* nothing needed here. */
}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {
  box-shadow: none;
}
p.p-space {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
div.output_unrecognized {
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
}
div.output_unrecognized a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.output_unrecognized a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.rendered_html {
  color: #000;
  /* any extras will just be numbers: */
}



.rendered_html :link {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.rendered_html :visited {
  text-decoration: underline;
}






.rendered_html h1:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.538em;
}
.rendered_html h2:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.636em;
}
.rendered_html h3:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.777em;
}
.rendered_html h4:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h5:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h6:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}








.rendered_html * + ul {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html * + ol {
  margin-top: 1em;
}


.rendered_html pre,



.rendered_html tr,
.rendered_html th,

.rendered_html td,


.rendered_html * + table {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + p {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + img {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html img,

.rendered_html img.unconfined,

div.text_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.text_cell > div.prompt {
    display: none;
  }
}
div.text_cell_render {
  /*font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Arial, Helvetica, Geneva, sans-serif;*/
  outline: none;
  resize: none;
  width: inherit;
  border-style: none;
  padding: 0.5em 0.5em 0.5em 0.4em;
  color: #000;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
}
a.anchor-link:link {
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 0px 20px;
  visibility: hidden;
}
h1:hover .anchor-link,
h2:hover .anchor-link,
h3:hover .anchor-link,
h4:hover .anchor-link,
h5:hover .anchor-link,
h6:hover .anchor-link {
  visibility: visible;
}
.text_cell.rendered .input_area {
  display: none;
}
.text_cell.rendered 
.text_cell.unrendered .text_cell_render {
  display: none;
}
.cm-header-1,
.cm-header-2,
.cm-header-3,
.cm-header-4,
.cm-header-5,
.cm-header-6 {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
.cm-header-1 {
  font-size: 185.7%;
}
.cm-header-2 {
  font-size: 157.1%;
}
.cm-header-3 {
  font-size: 128.6%;
}
.cm-header-4 {
  font-size: 110%;
}
.cm-header-5 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}
.cm-header-6 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}

G05wA7U+GXW7JekbTnADtT4Zdbsl6RtOcAO1Phl1uyXpG05wA7U+GXW7JekbTnADtT4Zdbsl6RtO
cAO1Phl1uyXpG05wCO1Phn1uyXpG05wA7U+GfW7JekbTnAJXFPhl1uyXpG05wA7U+GXW7JekbTnA
J7UuGXW7JekbTnADtS4Zdbsl6RtOcAO1Lhl1uyXpG05wA7UuGXW7JekbTnADtS4Zdbsl6RtOcAO1
Lhl1uyXpG05wA7UuGXW7JekbTnADtT4Zdbsl6RtOcAO1Phl1uyXpG05wCO1Lhl1uyXpG05wA7UuG
XW7JekbTnADtS4Zdbsl6RtOcAO1Lhl1uyXpG05wA7UuGXW7JekbTnADtS4Zdbsl6RtOcAO1Lhl1u
yXpG05wA7UuGXW7JekbTnAF7UeGXW7JekbTnAg7UuGXW7JekbTnADtS4Zdbsl6RtOcAjtR4Z9bsl
6RtOcII7UuGfW7JekbTnAB8UeGfW3JekbXnAI7UeGfW3JekbXnAI7UeGnW3JekbXnADtR4adbcl6
RtecAh8UOGmP1tyXpC15wqofFDhp1tybpC15wA7T+GnW3JukLXnAIfE/hr1tybpC15wCO0/hr1ty
bpC15wIO0/hr1tybpC15wAfE/hr1tybpC15wCO0/hr1sybpC15wgjtP4bdbMm6QtecAjtO4a9bMm
6QtecAh8T+G3WzJukLXnAIfE7ht1sybpC15wqlfE7hv1rybpC15wBXxN4b9a8n6QtecCIfEzhx1r
yfpC15wgR8S+HHWrJ/n9rzgCviXw561ZP8/tecKpXxK4ddasn+f2vOBC9pXDrrTlHz+25wgV8SeH
XWnKPn9tzgEdpPDvrTlHz+25wquB/ttuZ27/ANJ/0/l39G/2X+TfLfldDyHl/wCkNvyXlNvY29jx
tnHHDSEf/9k=
">
</img></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Tensorflow的介绍就不过多说了，总而言之它在人工智能领域有很出色的表现。</p>
<p>好了，今天的废话就只说那一句，接下来开始赶紧安装它，我已经迫不及待了。</p>
<p>我在电脑上用的是anaconda，所以我可以用anaconda创建一个虚拟环境来安装Tensorflow,这样在开发Tensorflow的时候也不会和其他项目的依赖发生冲突。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="创建虚拟环境">创建虚拟环境<a class="anchor-link" href="#创建虚拟环境">¶</a></h4>
<pre><code>conda create -n tensorflow python=2.7</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="激活虚拟环境">激活虚拟环境<a class="anchor-link" href="#激活虚拟环境">¶</a></h4>
<pre><code>source activate tensorflow

</code></pre>
<p>当然，如果你没有anaconda的话，也可以用python来创建虚拟环境，但是前提是你已经安装了virtualenv依赖包。</p>
<pre><code>sudo pip install virtualenv

virtualenv 环境名 --no-site-packages    #后面的参数代表这创建一个非常干净的Python环境，没有任何依赖包。

source 环境名/bin/active</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>激活虚拟环境之后，在命令行的最前面会出现虚拟环境的名称，就像这样：</p>
<pre><code>(tensorflow) sunnyin@sunnyin-win:~$</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="安装">安装<a class="anchor-link" href="#安装">¶</a></h4><p>然后执行这个命令，让环境变量生效：</p>
<pre><code># Ubuntu/Linux 64-bit, CPU only, Python 2.7
(tensorflow)$ export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>当然还有其它选项，可以根据自己的需求进行选择。</p>
<p>在这里需要补充的一点是，tensorflow支持GPU加速，如果你的GPU是英伟达的牌子，在安装的时候就可以选择：</p>
<pre><code># Ubuntu/Linux 64-bit, GPU enabled, Python 2.7

</code></pre>
<p>在安装过程中，它可以自动安装其它依赖。安装完成之后可以测试一下：</p>
<pre><code>pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

</code></pre>
<p>安装完成之后会看到这几个依赖包也安装完成了：</p>
<pre><code>six, funcsigs, pbr, mock, setuptools, protobuf, numpy, wheel, tensorflow</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="测试">测试<a class="anchor-link" href="#测试">¶</a></h4>
<pre><code>(tensorflow) sunnyin@sunnyin-win:~$ python
Python 2.7.12 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, Jul  2 2016, 17:42:40) 
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-1)] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
Anaconda is brought to you by Continuum Analytics.
Please check out: http://continuum.io/thanks and https://anaconda.org

>>> import tensorflow　as tf
>>> hello = tf.constant('Hello,TensorFlow!')
>>> sess = tf.Session()
>>> print(sess.run(hello))
Hello,TensorFlow!</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>ok,现在就可以继续在人工智能的世界里遨游啦！</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +
        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +

        "    displayIndent: '0em'," +
        "    showMathMenu: true," +

entry.title: 处理Ubuntu中的dpkg错误

<style type="text/css">/*!
*
* IPython notebook
*
*/
/* CSS font colors for translated ANSI colors. */
.ansibold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
/* use dark versions for foreground, to improve visibility */
.ansiblack {

}

}

}

}

}
/* and light for background, for the same reason */
.ansibgblack {

}

}

}

}

}
div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: transparent;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5px;
  /* This acts as a spacer between cells, that is outside the border */
  margin: 0px;
  outline: none;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent -40px, transparent 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 100%);
}
div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-color: #90CAF9;
  border-left-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  border-right-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-right-width: 1px;
  background: #E3F2FD;
}
@media print {
  div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #ababab;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-width: 0;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 7px, #E3F2FD 7px, #E3F2FD 100%);
}
.edit_mode div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #66BB6A;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #66BB6A -40px, #66BB6A 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  .edit_mode div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */
  min-width: 14ex;
  /* This padding is tuned to match the padding on the CodeMirror editor. */
  padding: 0.4em;
  margin: 0px;
  font-family: monospace;
  text-align: right;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Don't highlight prompt number selection */
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  /* Use default cursor */
  cursor: default;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  .prompt {
    text-align: left;
  }
}
div.inner_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
}
@-moz-document url-prefix() {
  div.inner_cell {
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_area {
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  border-radius: 2px;
  background: #f7f7f7;
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* This is needed so that empty prompt areas can collapse to zero height when there
   is no content in the output_subarea and the prompt. The main purpose of this is
   to make sure that empty JavaScript output_subareas have no height. */
div.prompt:empty {
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
div.unrecognized_cell {
  padding: 5px 5px 5px 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell {
  border-radius: 2px;
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  background: #eaeaea;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.unrecognized_cell > div.prompt {
    display: none;
  }
}
div.code_cell {
  /* avoid page breaking on code cells when printing */
}
@media print {
  div.code_cell {
    page-break-inside: avoid;
  }
}
/* any special styling for code cells that are currently running goes here */
div.input {
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.input {
    /* Old browsers */
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    display: -moz-box;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-align: stretch;
    display: box;
    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_prompt {
  color: #303F9F;
  border-top: 1px solid transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight {
  margin: 0.4em;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight > pre {
  margin: 0px;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;
 * }
 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;
  /* Changed from white to allow our bg to show through */
}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */
  /* we have set a different line-height and want this to scale with that. */
  padding: 0.4em;
}
.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  padding: 0 8px 0 4px;
}
.CodeMirror-gutters {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
  border-top-left-radius: 2px;
}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. We need the 0 value because of how we size */
  /* .CodeMirror-lines */
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/*

Original style from softwaremaniacs.org (c) Ivan Sagalaev <Maniac@SoftwareManiacs.Org>
Adapted from GitHub theme

*/
.highlight-base {
  color: #000;
}
.highlight-variable {
  color: #000;
}
.highlight-variable-2 {
  color: #1a1a1a;
}
.highlight-variable-3 {
  color: #333333;
}
.highlight-string {
  color: #BA2121;
}
.highlight-comment {
  color: #408080;
  font-style: italic;
}
.highlight-number {
  color: #080;
}
.highlight-atom {
  color: #88F;
}
.highlight-keyword {
  color: #008000;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.highlight-builtin {
  color: #008000;
}
.highlight-error {
  color: #f00;
}

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay {
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0px 0.4em;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {
  /* use inner shadow to get border that is computed the same on WebKit/FF */
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  background: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.5);
}
div.output_prompt {
  color: #D84315;
}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */
div.output_area {
  padding: 0px;
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.output_area .MathJax_Display {
  text-align: left !important;
}
div.output_area 
div.output_area 
div.output_area img,
div.output_area svg {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
div.output_area img.unconfined,
div.output_area svg.unconfined {
  max-width: none;
}
/* This is needed to protect the pre formating from global settings such
   as that of bootstrap */
.output {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.output_area {
    /* Old browsers */
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    display: -moz-box;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-align: stretch;
    display: box;
    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {
  padding: 0;
}
.js-error {
  color: darkred;
}
/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;

}
pre.raw_input_prompt {

}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {
  box-shadow: none;
}
p.p-space {

<p>我用的是Ubuntu16.04系统，今天在安装软件的时候，出现了dpkg错误，看错误的信息应该是源里面有错误。</p>

update-initramfs: failed for /boot/initrd.img-4.4.0-43-generic with 1.
dpkg: error processing package initramfs-tools (--configure):
 subprocess installed post-installation script returned error exit status 1
No apport report written because MaxReports is reached already
                                                              Processing triggers for systemd (229-4ubuntu10) ...
Processing triggers for ureadahead (0.100.0-19) ...
Errors were encountered while processing:
 linux-image-4.4.0-45-generic
 linux-image-extra-4.4.0-45-generic
 linux-image-generic
 linux-generic
 linux-signed-image-4.4.0-45-generic
 linux-signed-image-generic
 linux-signed-generic
 initramfs-tools</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>后来看这篇<a href="http://www.billmal.com/billmal/billmal.nsf/dx/ubuntu-catalog-fix.htm?opendocument&comments">文章</a>，并没有解决问题。于是我只有将源的目录清空一下了</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<pre><code>root@sunnyin-win:~# mv /var/lib/dpkg/info/ /var/lib/dpkg/info_backup/

root@sunnyin-win:~# mkdir /var/lib/dpkg/info/</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>然后就好了。</p>
<p>后来我查了一下/var/lib/dpkg/info/是干什么用：</p>
<p><strong>dpkg是Debian的中级软件包管理器,类似RPM.dpkg是Debian软件包管理系统的中流砥柱,负责安全卸载软件包,配置,以及维护已安装的软件包.也是Debian系统中众多软件包管理工具的后端.系统中所有packages的信息都在/var/lib/dpkg/目录下,其中子目录”/var/lib/dpkg/info”用于保存各个软件包的配置文件列表. </strong></p>
<ul>
<li><p>.conffiles 记录了软件包的配置文件列表</p>
</li>
<li><p>.list 保存软件包中的文件列表,用户可以从.list的信息中找到软件包中文件的具体安装位置.</p>
</li>
<li><p>.md5sums 记录了软件包的md5信息,这个信息是用来进行包验证的.</p>
</li>
<li><p>.prerm 脚本在Debian报解包之前运行,主要作用是停止作用于即将升级的软件包的服务,直到软件包安装或升级完成.</p>
</li>
<li><p>.postinst脚本是完成Debian包解开之后的配置工作,通常用于执行所安装软件包相关命令和服务重新启动.</p>
</li>
<li><p>/var/lib/dpkg/available文件的内容是软件包的描述信息,该软件包括当前系统所使用的Debian安装源中的所有软件包,其中包括当前系统中已安装的和未安装的软件包.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<p>这里有一些dpkg的使用命令，挺有用的：</p>
<ul>
<li><p>dpkg –l: 命令用于查询当前系统所有以安装的deb包的信息.,通过less和grep可以执行更复杂的查询工作.</p>
</li>
<li><p>dpkg –s (软件包名称): 命令查看软件包的详细情况,包括版本,依赖之类的</p>
</li>
<li><p>dpkg –L (软件包名称): 命令用于查询系统中所安装软件包的安装的文件安装到系统的位置和安装了那些.</p>
</li>
<li><p>dpkg -P: 彻底的卸载 包括软件的配置文件等等</p>
</li>
</ul>
</hr></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="参考">参考<a class="anchor-link" href="#参考">¶</a></h3><p>[1]. <a href="http://www.iteye.com/topic/138041">http://www.iteye.com/topic/138041</a></p>
<p>[2]. <a href="http://blog.163.com/lby67224262@126/blog/static/171415341201302592160/">http://blog.163.com/lby67224262@126/blog/static/171415341201302592160/</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {
  padding: 0;
}
.js-error {
  color: darkred;
}
/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  padding-top: 5px;
}
pre.raw_input_prompt {
  /* nothing needed here. */
}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {
  box-shadow: none;
}
p.p-space {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
div.output_unrecognized {
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
}
div.output_unrecognized a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.output_unrecognized a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.rendered_html {
  color: #000;
  /* any extras will just be numbers: */
}



.rendered_html :link {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.rendered_html :visited {
  text-decoration: underline;
}






.rendered_html h1:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.538em;
}
.rendered_html h2:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.636em;
}
.rendered_html h3:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.777em;
}
.rendered_html h4:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h5:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h6:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}








.rendered_html * + ul {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html * + ol {
  margin-top: 1em;
}


.rendered_html pre,



.rendered_html tr,
.rendered_html th,

.rendered_html td,


.rendered_html * + table {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + p {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + img {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html img,

.rendered_html img.unconfined,

div.text_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.text_cell > div.prompt {
    display: none;
  }
}
div.text_cell_render {
  /*font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Arial, Helvetica, Geneva, sans-serif;*/
  outline: none;
  resize: none;
  width: inherit;
  border-style: none;
  padding: 0.5em 0.5em 0.5em 0.4em;
  color: #000;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
}
a.anchor-link:link {
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 0px 20px;
  visibility: hidden;
}
h1:hover .anchor-link,
h2:hover .anchor-link,
h3:hover .anchor-link,
h4:hover .anchor-link,
h5:hover .anchor-link,
h6:hover .anchor-link {
  visibility: visible;
}
.text_cell.rendered .input_area {
  display: none;
}
.text_cell.rendered 
.text_cell.unrendered .text_cell_render {
  display: none;
}
.cm-header-1,
.cm-header-2,
.cm-header-3,
.cm-header-4,
.cm-header-5,
.cm-header-6 {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
.cm-header-1 {
  font-size: 185.7%;
}
.cm-header-2 {
  font-size: 157.1%;
}
.cm-header-3 {
  font-size: 128.6%;
}
.cm-header-4 {
  font-size: 110%;
}
.cm-header-5 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}
.cm-header-6 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>今天去参加了由脉脉主办的“中国云服务创新大会”。我知道过去就是听广告了，但是我觉得总是能听到一些新鲜的东西的，所以还是去了。</p>
<h3 id="我很高兴拿机器学习来说事">我很高兴拿机器学习来说事<a class="anchor-link" href="#我很高兴拿机器学习来说事">¶</a></h3><p>会场不大，能容下500人左右，但是去现场的人都比较特殊，他们都是脉脉的用户。脉脉为一大群有共同话题的人搭建了一个社交平台，他们在2013年的80万用户被估值1亿美元到现在的2000万用户，厉害。不过今天不是说脉脉的，因为我对它也不是很了解，只是听了个表面。</p>
<p>今天演讲的嘉宾都是有云服务的厂家，Ucloud、七牛云、微软云等，我重点关注了一下微软云，因为前面的几个嘉宾讲的真的让我觉得垃圾死了，一点技术含量都没有，还不如电视上那个“卖手机，就上爱回收”好听，虽然这是我认为世界上最恶心的广告词之一。</p>
<p>微软的嘉宾是微软云计算专家委员会秘书长，他在台上说了几个案例。第一个是雷钜与微软的案例，雷钜的一款用来验血的医疗器械“租用”给医院，按使用资源收费，但是由于无法完美的监控资源的使用，所以使得雷钜一年损失不少钱，之后选择了微软云平台，通过物联网技术来完美地监测器械的使用情况，得以弥补了之前的大量的损失(据说一年一个亿)。</p>
<p>这个案例涉及到了物联网，下面的案例就完全是和机器学习相关的了，这让我听着很兴奋。比如有一款软件可以识别任何花的种类，有很多花我们都叫不上名字来，听起来很神奇，其实在我看来非常简单。就是将训练好的大量的模型存放在后台，当有输入时，就会调用模型来对图片进行分类。这个过程中将用到图片处理，特征提取，算法预测等，这正是我每天都在做的研究。当然，后面又说了几个案例，也是有关机器学习的，比如通过对人像的情绪扫描来实现精准营销等。这里就不一一列举了，我想说明的是，通过这个嘉宾的演讲，更加让我坚信我努力的方向没有错，并且这正是我最爱的领域。</p>
<h3 id="别动不动再炒大数据了">别动不动再炒大数据了<a class="anchor-link" href="#别动不动再炒大数据了">¶</a></h3><p>之所以对前面两位嘉宾的演讲如此不屑，并不是因为他们长得丑，只是因为都现在这个时间了，他们还在炒大数据。那么，我想在这篇文章中聊一聊我对大数据的看法，当然，这是我个人的看法，并没有在这里班门弄斧的意思，我只是想在这里记录一下自己的学习笔记，也作为日后成长的一个参照。不过我很是欢迎看到这篇文章的朋友和我一起讨论，<a href="http://imyin.xyz/pages/about-me.html">毕竟知识是需要分享的</a>。</p>
<p>说起大数据，都会聚焦在“大”字上，其实大数据的一个真正的概念叫做“互通”（当然同义词都可以，你高兴就好）。好比阿里掌握了我逛淘宝的所有行为数据，然后生成了我的用户画像，但是那只是我网购的一面，每个人都是多维的。所以如果阿里又获取了我在微博、微信、知乎、豆瓣等等平台的数据，它们之间相互关联，生成我个人的用户画像，那时才算一个比较完整的我。当然阿里不会只对我一个人感兴趣，假若根据用户数据要生成中国13亿人口的完整用户画像，那就是大数据。当然，这只是其中一个例子，你可以把这个例子移植到工业制造、社会发展、人类生存，就会发现，哦，真的好大啊，但跟我好像没啥关系。</p>
<p>确实，不仅跟你没啥关系。现在的很多企业都声称自己在做大数据，以为用个hadoop或者spark就大数据了，其实只是在做大量的数据，根本没有把大数据的概念体现出来，所以跟他也没啥关系。当然，有钱的企业可以去购买其他领域的数据，搭建服务平台，自己构建算法仓库等等高大上的行为，比如阿里。。。以后的世界到底有多智能？</p>
<p>既然现在DT时代已经来临，国家也号召数据逐渐开放，我们老百姓也不能让这些数据像雨水一样从指间溜走啊，攒下来煮个粥还是可以的。也许，DT时代进入鼎盛期时，每个人在屏幕上点点鼠标就可以进行数据挖掘。</p>
<h3 id="站在高处，看远方">站在高处，看远方<a class="anchor-link" href="#站在高处，看远方">¶</a></h3><p>我之前是做大数据处理的，其实在本质上和之前的Oracle技术没什么太大的区别，仅仅只是技术的升级而已，用用Hadoop、Spark啥的，有他妈什么卵用，真是浪费人家这开源技术，浪费数据资源。哎，某些企业啊！</p>
<p>我想在以后很少会有公司自己去花钱搭建集群了，现在云平台越来越多，该有的功能都有，业务场景也能够实现个性化定制，那么以后几乎就不怎么需要运维人员了。但是就像我前面说的，数据会越来越容易得到，硬件也会越来月便宜，那么我们自己完全可以做一些数据挖掘，机器学习，来探索自己未知的领域，我想，这在以后是完全可以实现的，<strong>千万不要仅仅局限于做一名技术人员，眼光远一些，让自己多元化一些。</strong></p>
<p>所以，现在的我看的很清楚，既然对机器学习以及探索未知如此感兴趣，那么这条路就要坚强地走下去。以后的世界谁也说不准，但是努力做自己最爱的东西，时间长了必然会成为这以领域的“熟工”。</p>
<p>加油！Yin.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">if (!document.getElementById('mathjaxscript_pelican_#%@#$@#')) {
    var mathjaxscript = document.createElement('script');

    mathjaxscript.type = 'text/javascript';
    mathjaxscript.src = '//cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML';
    mathjaxscript[(window.opera ? "innerHTML" : "text")] =
        "MathJax.Hub.Config({" +

        "    TeX: { extensions: ['AMSmath.js','AMSsymbols.js','noErrors.js','noUndefined.js'], equationNumbers: { autoNumber: 'AMS' } }," +
        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +
        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +

    (document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(mathjaxscript);
}
